StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalLinkDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Allows the user to override the environmental library path. (-L[folder])

BoolProperty.Name: LinkLibraryDependencies
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether or not library outputs from project dependencies are automatically linked in.

BoolProperty.Name: UseLibraryDependencyInputs
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether or not the inputs to the librarian tool are used rather than the library file itself when linking in library outputs of project dependencies.

EnumValue.Name: DisableAllWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Suppresses the output of all warning messages.

EnumValue.Name: NormalWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Run clang with normal warning output level.

EnumValue.Name: AllWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Display all possible warnings detected by clang.

BoolProperty.Name: TreatWarningAsError
BoolProperty.Description: Treats all linker warnings as errors.

BoolProperty.Name: IgnoreDynamicLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Normally emcc will treat dynamic linking like static linking, by linking in the code from the dynamic library. This fails if the same dynamic library is linked more than once. With this option, dynamic linking is ignored, which allows the build system to proceed without errors. However, you will need to manually link to the shared libraries later on yourself.Disregards dynamic library linking minification process will be executed for the generated JavaScript code.

StringListProperty.Name: PreJsFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a .js file to embed to the beginning of the generated script file, before running optimizations on the file.

StringListProperty.Name: PostJsFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a .js file to embed to the beginning of the generated script file, after optimizations have been performed.

StringListProperty.Name: EmbedFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a list of resource files to embed inside the generated JavaScript file.

StringListProperty.Name: PreloadFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a list of resource files to preload for the HTML page before running the compiled JavaScript code.

StringListProperty.Name: HtmlShellFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the .html file template inside which the generated JavaScript code will be generated to.

StringListProperty.Name: JsLibrary
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies additional JavaScript libraries to link the generated code with.

StringProperty.Name: IncludedAssetTargets
StringProperty.Description: Additional target names to be bundled into preload files.

EnumProperty.Name: GenerateDebugInformation
EnumProperty.Description: This option enables creation of debugging information.

EnumValue.Name: NotSpecified
EnumValue.Description: Produces no debugging information.

EnumValue.Name: NoDebugInformation
EnumValue.Description: Produces no debugging information.

EnumValue.Name: MinimalDebugInformation
EnumValue.Description: Preserve whitespace in JavaScript.

EnumValue.Name: WithDebugInformation
EnumValue.Description: Preserve function names in compiled code.

EnumValue.Name: MoreDebugInformation
EnumValue.Description: Keep debug info, including JS whitespace, function names, and LLVM debug info if any.

EnumValue.Name: FullDebugInformation
EnumValue.Description: Generate a source map using LLVM debug information. Source maps allow you to view and debug the C/C++ source code in your browser’s debugger.

StringProperty.Name: SourceMapBase
StringProperty.Description: The URL for the location where WebAssembly source maps will be published. (--source-map-base [base url])

BoolProperty.Name: Profiling
BoolProperty.Description: Use reasonable defaults when emitting JavaScript to make the build readable but still useful for profiling. (--profiling)

BoolProperty.Name: ProfilingFunctions
BoolProperty.Description: Preserve function names in profiling, but otherwise minify whitespace and names as we normally do in optimized builds. (--profiling-funcs)

BoolProperty.Name: Tracing
BoolProperty.Description: Enable the Emscripten Tracing API. For details, see https://emscripten.org/docs/api_reference/trace.h.html#trace-h. (--tracing)

BoolProperty.Name: EmitSymbolMap
BoolProperty.Description: Save a map file between the minified global names and the original function names. (--emit-symbol-map)

BoolProperty.Name: CPUProfiling
BoolProperty.Description: Embeds a simple CPU profiler onto the generated page. (--cpuprofiler)

BoolProperty.Name: MemoryProfiling
BoolProperty.Description: Embeds a memory allocation tracker onto the generated page. (--memoryprofiler)

BoolProperty.Name: ThreadProfiling
BoolProperty.Description: Embeds a thread activity profiler onto the generated page. (--threadprofiler)

StringProperty.Name: HeapInitialSize
StringProperty.Description: The initial amount of memory to use. Default is 16 MB. (-s INITIAL_MEMORY)

StringProperty.Name: HeapMaximumSize
StringProperty.Description: Set the maximum size of memory in the wasm module (in bytes). Default is 2 GB. (-s INITIAL_MEMORY)

BoolProperty.Name: EnableMemoryGrowth
BoolProperty.Description: If true, we will grow the memory arrays at runtime, seamlessly and dynamically.

BoolProperty.Name: EmRun
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the generated output to be aware of the emrun command line tool.

BoolProperty.Name: EmBind
BoolProperty.Description: Compiles the source code using the Embind bindings to connect C/C++ and JavaScript.

EnumValue.Name: O1
EnumValue.Description: asm.js, relooping, disable exceptions, disable emcc system assertions, enable aliasing function pointers

EnumValue.Name: O3
EnumValue.Description: LLVM LTO, closure, force aligned memory, truncate doubles to floats on loads and stores, substitute double for int64

EnumValue.Name: Os
EnumValue.Description: LLVM LTO, closure, force aligned memory, truncate doubles to floats on loads and stores, substitute double for int64

EnumValue.Name: Oz
EnumValue.Description: LLVM LTO, closure, force aligned memory, truncate doubles to floats on loads and stores, substitute double for int64

EnumProperty.Name: RunJavaScriptOptimization
EnumProperty.Description: Enables JavaScript optimizations, relevant when we generate JavaScript. (--js-opts)

EnumValue.Name: NotSpecified
EnumValue.Description: The optimization level will be set to a good value.

EnumValue.Name: NoJavaScriptOptimization
EnumValue.Description: Prevent JavaScript optimizer from running.

EnumValue.Name: JavaScriptOptimization
EnumValue.Description: Use JavaScript optimizer (default).

EnumProperty.Name: RunLLVMOptimization
EnumProperty.Description: Enables LLVM optimizations, relevant when we call the LLVM optimizer. (--llvm-opts)

EnumValue.Name: NotSpecified
EnumValue.Description: The optimization level will be set to a good value.

EnumValue.Name: NoLLVMOptimization
EnumValue.Description: No LLVM optimizations.

EnumValue.Name: LLVMOptimizationLevel1
EnumValue.Description: LLVM -O1 optimizations

EnumValue.Name: LLVMOptimizationLevel2
EnumValue.Description: LLVM -O2 optimizations

EnumValue.Name: LLVMOptimizationLevel3
EnumValue.Description: LLVM -O3 optimizations

EnumValue.Name: NotSpecified
EnumValue.Description: The optimization level will be set to a good value.

EnumValue.Name: NoLLVMLTO
EnumValue.Description: No LLVM LTO (default).

EnumValue.Name: LLVMLTOLevel1
EnumValue.Description: LLVM LTO is performed.

EnumValue.Name: LLVMLTOLevel2
EnumValue.Description: Combine all the bitcode and run LLVM opt on it using the specified --llvm-opts.

EnumValue.Name: LLVMLTOLevel3
EnumValue.Description: Does level 2 and then level 1.

BoolProperty.Name: RunClosureCompiler
BoolProperty.Description: Forces the closure compiler to be run as part of the build or skips it if set to false.

BoolProperty.Name: RunMinify
BoolProperty.Description: Skips the JS code minification process if set to false.

EnumProperty.Name: TypedArrays
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the compilation mode for typed arrays. See https://github.com/kripken/emscripten/wiki/Code-Generation-Modes.

StringListProperty.Name: EnableWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to be enabled.

StringListProperty.Name: DisableWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to be suppressed.

BoolProperty.Name: EchoCommandLines
BoolProperty.Description: Print out the commands emcc is invoked with during linking.
